thread.title: North Beach Village Resort Transforms Into Candy Village for Halloween Family Fun
thread.title_full: North Beach Village Resort Transforms Into Candy Village for Halloween Family Fun - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: North Beach Village Resort Transforms Into Candy Village for Halloween Family Fun
text:
North Beach Village Resort
FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla. , Oct. 12, It's not about the tricks this Halloween , it's all about the treats in Fort Lauderdale's North Beach Village. North Beach Village Resort is inviting kids and adults of all ages, on October 31, 2015 from 3 p.m. to 7 p.m. , to embark on a journey of sweet adventure.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151012/275988
"We have taken seven of our hotels and transformed them into themed miniature candy lands â€“ perfect for trick-or-treaters who are looking to have a fun and safe experience," says VP of Operations Christine Sposa . "Here in the Village, our motto is 'Love and Happiness' and we know we are going to make kids and adults of all ages happy this Halloween as they experience all our Candy Village has to offer."
Costumed trick-or-treaters are invited to travel through seven mouthwatering lands, including Gumdrop Mountain, Twizzler Town, and Lollipop Land, in search of tasty treats and a fun Halloween -themed crafting session at North Beach Village Design. North Beach Village Design is North Beach Village Resort's newest addition, featuring one of a kind artwork and sculptures.
Adults will also get to participate in their very own trick-or-treat activities alongside the young adventurers on their journey through Candy Village. The Village Cafe will be serving up specialty fall themed menu options and refreshments for purchase.
North Beach Village Resort consists of 15 mid-century modern boutique hotels, three restaurants, and newly opened gallery space North Beach Village Design.
The Candy Village trick-or-treat adventure begins at North Beach Village Design located at 600 Breakers Ave, Fort Lauderdale 33304 (corner of Terramar & Breakers). Paid parking will be available in area lots or meters.
To RSVP for this event visit bit.ly/nbvrcandyvillage or call (754) 229-3867. To learn more about North Beach Village Resort visit www.northbeachvillageresort.com .
About North Beach Village Resort
North Beach Village Resort is a collection of 15 mid-century modern boutique hotels located just a few miles inland from Fort Lauderdale Beach, just steps away from countless attractions including the historic Bonnet House. Each resort location offers a different flair, a different view of Fort Lauderdale , or a unique attraction. Resort guests can enjoy the amenities of a resort, like larger than life rooms and suites with kitchen appliances, and flat screen cable televisions, plus a practical living space that allows guests to vacation on their own terms. Additional North Beach Village Resort offerings include the relaxed yet distinguished Village Cafe, energizing relaxing Village Yoga, bicycle rentals for unguided escapades along the coast, a multitude of crystal blue pools, complimentary wifi, and more. Visit www.northbeachvillageresort.com
